content.description: start in lowest hueco, go left a bit, and go big to the jug
content.protection: pads, not great looking landing, but pretty easy to protect
content.location: obvious line of huecos on steep side of the boulder

content.description: Kinda scary but fun, on the tall slab side of the boulder, climb up the middle start standing on a rock

Start, and first few moves are the same as Shaved Pits, but then go right for the finish instead of straight up. Significantly harder than Shaved Pits. Goes directly over the large boulder. Very steep!

 Start on the very lowest hueco with a nice horizontal ledge in it. Go up through a couple glossy huecos to one with a good lip on the left side. From there get to the jugs out right, and finish using the crack for your right hand.

 V2 in Sherman's book, but felt at least a grade harder to me.
content.location: Start on the very lowest hueco with a nice horizontal ledge in it. Go up through a couple glossy huecos to one with a good lip on the left side. From there go to jugs out right, and finish using the crack for your right hand.

content.description: start to the left of obvious chalked hueco(start of shaved pits) on good underclings, go left
content.location: on the steep face directly left of shaved pits

content.description: a stones throw from scary boulder/melon patch   almost directly behind Mushroom boulder
